website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice if you plan on using it exclusively as a travel pen for small dog breeds or puppies. Everyday use is better suited to cats.
pros: Lightweight structure and easy set-up make this a great portable pen
cons: Some users find their dogs chew on the zippers

customer_reviews.title: I think a he actually liked it because it made him feel secure when I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kennel when my dog was nearing end of life to keep him safe when I wasn't home. He was almost 17 years old with renal failure and visual impairment. I lined the bottom with absorbent pads and made him a soft bed. He was contained so he couldn't bump into things in the house and he peed at his leisure without ruining the floor. I think a he actually liked it because it made him feel secure when I wasn't with him. I liked it because it felt more like a baby play pin rather than a cage. This is a small kennel, perfect for my chihuahua. He passed recently and I miss him like crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Sadie Bell

customer_reviews.title: Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE this travel pen. I have a chihuahua who gets plenty of room in this! She loves it. It's very durable. You can unzip the bottom of the cage- when I put her outside in the grass. And the top also zips on and off. Love love love it. Well worth the 40. And was much bigger than I thought it would be also. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: This product has a major fault
customer_reviews.text: Initially, I liked this product. I did notice that without the zippered top, it had a tendency to tip over if the dog jumped on the side. I thought that using the top would prevent this. By the time my puppy was 14 weeks old, he tipped the pen over on its side and proceeded to eat a hole in the floor of the pen. Tonight he is undergoing emergency surgery to remove an intestinal obstruction caused by the plastic shreds of the pen's floor.
customer_reviews.author: MDCRN

customer_reviews.title: We Love It!
customer_reviews.text: My Pomeranian puppy loves her new pen! You can see how much room she has in it from the pictures. Right now, I'm sitting with her, reassuring her that this is a safe, comfy place to be. Later, she'll start getting used to it, and I won't feel worried when leaving her alone at home, when I have to go somewhere. It comes with a carrying case, a top and bottom, and I love how everything zips up. She's a jumper... A really high jumper, even at age 14 weeks, but she can't jump out of it. I'll probably put the top on it if I have to leave her alone, though. I'm so happy I got her this pen!
customer_reviews.author: LindaTop Contributor: Crochet

customer_reviews.title: The answer to all my cat traveling problems!
customer_reviews.text: This is an answer to all my pet traveling problems! I kept the top and bottom off with the door open so my kitties get used to it. I also put their toys, extra yummy favorite food in there along with their full size litter box. Plenty of room for them. I live in a tropical climate and no stranger to terrible storms and hurricanes. This is the PURRFECT solution so I can bring my kitties and know they will not be as freaked out in a hotel or with friends and family waiting out bad weather because they are safely contained to their small area they know is all theirs, while I have peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: JodieTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Outdoor Cat Kennel and New Kitten Space
customer_reviews.text: I use this pet kennel for my indoor cats to get some fresh air on nice days. Its a nice size for two adult cats to move around in. My male cat loves it but my girl tries to claw it open. it hasn't torn or ripped anywhere it's very easy to fold up and it even comes with its own bag to store it in. Last week I got a new kitten so I purchased a second one so he could get used to his surroundings and my adult cats and dog could look in without scaring him it's been a life saver and made transitioning for the little guy to a new home easier.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke!
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was great EXCEPT I just had the same problem others have written about...the zipper that connects the boots canvas just broke...actually zipped right off. I was cleaning the canvas bottom with a wet rag and noticed there was a 2 “ gap where the zipper closes. When I re-zipped it, it came right off the track! My 8 pound dog had not messed with it at all. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: ITS USED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product.....However, it is clearly USED. There are animal hairs on the floor piece. There is a stain on the carrying case. There is also a stain of fecal matter/ mud/ blood...on the wall of the item.
customer_reviews.author: My opinion

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: My puppy is 2 months old and weighs 5 pounds. He's in the pen for maybe a few hours a day. I've had this barely over a month (right outside the return window of course) and he's already managed to chew through the bottom liner where the zipper is and was able to just go underneath and let himself out after that. So now I had to connect the top mesh part as the bottom so he can't get out for now until I find something better to replace this. Included pics of torn zipper and pupper for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my two cats; they love going outside. However, I'm a nervous cat mom and don't want them prowling the neighborhood. This was a great solution :) I can garden, sit outside, lay in my hammock, all while the kitties are safe in their playpen watching birds. Sometimes I leave the bottom part off so they can enjoy the grass. The product itself is easy to set up, and it comes with stakes to keep it anchored to the ground (should you need to do so). It's well made and had no defects or smell upon arrival. It is a little hard to fold it back up, but that could just be me :P
customer_reviews.author: Jordy

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, easy to handle
customer_reviews.text: Well made, especially for a collapsible pet playpen. I purchased this to put in the back of my SUV for my two cats who hate their individual carriers and cry when they're separated. I put it in our bedroom to get them used to it. They actually slept in it. It's big enough for them, their food and their litter box. It's not going to stop a chewing puppy or dog, but for cats it works well.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful life saver!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase this because of the reviews had stated that the zipper was bad quality and that animals could easily scratch their way out of the netting. I was pleasantly surprised to find that I had no issues at all with that. It's great quality and so worth the money. I used it for a long time with a kitten and she scratched it daily and attempts to break free but it did not unravel at all and the zipper is still going strong. I have used it for two large male cats who have tried to scratch it as well but it still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Cat, Chris and Family

customer_reviews.title: Overall I'm satisfied with this product
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm satisfied with this product. It came in perfect condition and was extremely easy to assemble. But after three days of my puppy being inside the play pen my 1.5 pound Morkie of 11 weeks old I guess learned that he could bite through the "2 zipper doorways" and wiggled his way out. My only suggestion would be for the manufacturer to make the zipper doorway half "material" and half "mesh" just like the remainder of the playpen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Every new puppy owner need this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very playful pup who likes to follow me everywhere but is still potty training. So accidents were getting out of hand. But not anymore! He loves his new play area which is big enough to fit his fluffy bed, plenty of pee pads, and has enough room.for him to stand or jump if he wanted to. He can see me from every angle, and since it's super light weight I can bring it to any room in the house with no fuss. The only thing I need to test now is the durability. But since the bottom and the top can zip off, I'm sure cleaning his messes will help it look brand new.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: It's like a puppy room
customer_reviews.text: This playpen is awesome! Originally we had a kennel for our new puppy and she absolutely hated it. We decided to try the playpen instead and it is perfect for her. There's a lot of room for her to move around and we can keep her food dishes inside of it, as well as store all of her toys. The playpen is easy to set up and comes with a bag to take it with you places. The top and bottom come off which is really neat for when you want to set up the pen outside. Highly recommend for anyone wanting to give their pet it's own space :)
customer_reviews.author: Sweet-as-Candy

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Sturdy and amazing quality
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a temporary outdoor structure for my chicks. I wanted something with removable top and or bottom, easily washable and foldable for storage, and sturdy so my chicks can spend part of the day outside in the fresh air while they wait to be added into the coop. This playpen is absolutely perfect. It’s much sturdier than I expected! Great size! Nice quality. I expect this will last me many years to come. I imagine it would also be great for cats for some temporary outdoor time or small dogs or puppies. It would also be great indoors. I am so happy I found this product, and my chicks are very happy with their safe outside time!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Great for foster kittens!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for foster kittens . this has more than met my expectations. Easy to put up, easy to fold. Super easy to clean I hose it down and for ringworm kittens this folds down to the perfect size to soak in bleach solution in the tub. Have done this repeatedly with no color loss. Top and bottom can go in washer . Moves around easily when set up. Kittens love it they can safely see the world. They love climbing and so far after 2 litters remains completely intact. The only issue was when of my crafty adult cats opened from outside but that's not a product issue. Have recomended to other fosters.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bonkers kitten has not been able to destroy this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect for a lunatic male kitten - very durable, very easy to put up and take down to move to another room, it's quite large so he's got room to do somersaults with his toys and room for the litter box, bowls, bed. He seems to really love being able to watch everything that's going on in the house, the other animals, etc., I love that he's not swinging from the chandeliers (which he would if he could reach them). After about 2 months, no snags, no tears, easy to clean, it has honestly kept me from feeling so overwhelmed, and I can just enjoy his crazy, loving spirit.
customer_reviews.author: JH

customer_reviews.title: It has Survived Stray Cat Socializing
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this product, along with my relatives cat and my cats. They loved playing in it and causing all sorts of mischief! I am trying to use this to keep stray 9 month old kittens in as I catch them to socialize them. I REALLY hope it survives their wear and tear. Update: It has survived the kittens trying to tear a hole into the product to escape. Thankfully, they realized quickly they can't escape. If they completely focused on tearing a hole in it (like a Jack Russell Terrier focuses), they would have escaped. They have now adjusted enough to be released into a spare room and don't have accidents on my floor.
customer_reviews.author: Val Jeppe

customer_reviews.title: Way better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting something flimsy. OMG, this thing was sturdy all the way around. So good my mother in law bought one for her rescued kitten. Love the top & bottom zipper features along with the ability to stake it down outside if needed. Used it to quarantine 6 week old kitten for 8 weeks that had ringworm. I Disinfected this thing everyday with Accel Rescue for 10 weeks and still no breakdown, tears, rips ect. Kitten now calls it home and plays in it, climbs on it, ect and it holds up like a champ. Totally recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: AzG

customer_reviews.title: LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: Recently took a road trip with our 3 dogs, 2 of which are 80+ pounds. Bought these to kennel them for short amounts of time in hotel rooms when we needed to step out. The dogs loved them! I was pleasantly surprised at how spacious they are, and how easy they were to setup and put away. They fold up very flat which was awesome for traveling with. Absolutely glad we purchased these!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Griswold

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy up
customer_reviews.text: What a great product especially for the price.. About $40.00 Large, Sturdy and Quality.. nice heavy weight material. I use for my cats and my dogs. The cats especially love it. My main purpose was two fold. Something for the kitty when I go outside and something for a senior dog who might in the very near future have incontinence problems. I would not think this would be good to leave a pet in while you are gone but for short term (when company comes) this is perfect... Not as small as a kennel but a larger, secure alternative....Love it and have used it now four time.
customer_reviews.author: NACORN

customer_reviews.title: Handy
customer_reviews.text: This playpen was used at a street fair to feature four kittens up for adoption. They were the hit of the event, and all four found good homes. We also used this as a means to keep bottle fed kittens contained at a worksite. By leaving the zippered sides open and taping cardboard boxes to the openings we had a feeding "room" and a litter area. A great way to take kittens with you. The only complaint is that the zipper across the top was pulled away from the sides in a few spots. Needle and thread fixed that.
customer_reviews.author: ruralwnd

customer_reviews.title: Portable, convenient
customer_reviews.text: We like taking our Frenchie pup with us to relatives' homes, but understand that not everyone is comfortable having a puppy roaming their house. This pen gives her a safe space away from crazy toddlers, as well as allows us to enjoy a full dinner uninterrupted. It's big enough for a 18x24 potty pad, small bed, some toys and a water/food bowl. This has made it SO convenient for us to travel with her near and far. Although it's too big to fit inside a standard carryon, it'll fit inside a standard luggage. Very lightweight and easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: Looks sturdy but zipper broke after 2 days
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived and assembly was simple. I was happy with the product, it looked sturdy but the zipper broke after only two days of use. I have a 1.2 lb mini schnauzer pup, she only spent a few hours in the pen and she mostly ran around in circles. At first I thought the bottom portion had simply become unzipped but when I tried to zip it up, the zipper was on one end and the seam continued to open up, I couldn't zip it closed. Imagine a backpack with a messed up zipper, same thing. So now I'm out $40, my dog will quickly figure out how to break out, and I'll have to buy another product elsewhere.....ugh!
customer_reviews.author: Al

customer_reviews.title: Very easy assembling and very fine for pets!!
customer_reviews.text: First of all I am very...very thankful to ESK for delivering the item one day before the due date!! I am participating on a Tennis tournament on Saturday morning and have to leave on Friday evening but the playpen was due on Friday night. Thanks to ESK's service it arrived on Thursday. About the playpen.....very easy to assemble and fold. Great for my two bunnies since sometimes they pee & poop out of the potty and the canvas saves the hassle of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Sanche Rave

customer_reviews.title: Worth it for young pups!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this 10 stars I would. This play pen was great when our pup was under 4 months. It helped so much to have a place to put him besides his crate when we were cooking, showering, etc. And to give the older dog some peace. We did have potty pads in the play pen which helped with potty training. Very easy to clean! This thing seriously saved our sanity and while he outgrew it by 6 months it was well worth it for the time we had it. I had also been worried about the space it takes up but we had no problem making it work in our apartment.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Portable and durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this play yard for our 8-week-old puppy. There's plenty of room for her bed, food/water bowls and still leaves an area for her to play. The product is very study and the outside pockets are an added plus! I would recommend this product to anyone looking for a play yard for puppies or small breed dogs.
customer_reviews.author: D. Ford

customer_reviews.title: Great play pen for long car rides!
customer_reviews.text: Had to take my 8 week old kitten on a 10 hour cat ride, so I folded the seats down in my RAV4 and set this up. There is room for a full size litter box, room to play, and room for a full size cat bed. She loved being able see to see out and also climb all over the sides. She kept herself busy and only meowed 5 times or less. Highly recommend! Also, the bottom comes off if you want to set it on the grass so it feels like they are outside. There are stakes that come with it to stake it into the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Nutsch

customer_reviews.title: Great size for small pup
customer_reviews.text: Great size for a small puppy. Only issue I have is the Velcro mechanism for the door. The Velcro placement on the sidewalk is horizontal but when you roll up the door the Velcro on the mesh door is vertical. Essentially giving less contact area for the 2. If I were to say an improvement that could be done is finding a better way to secure the doors (especially when a small pup can just jump and grab it). Other than that our Yorkie pup goes in there when she needs to poop on her pad so that’s been beneficial.
customer_reviews.author: Chippy

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I have had a new puppy for the last few months. I purchased this item right after I brought him home, a bernedoodle pup at 9 weeks. He sleeps in the playpen every night and it is perfect for him. He loves the cave like feel when I put a sheet over it. I love that he cannot get into anything or chew valuable cables or shoes when I'm asleep. It also is a life save when I want to take a shower! I keep a regular crate in my den for when I wish to go out. I have traveled with this playpen as well. It folds easily and was invaluable when my family traveled.
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Great for a puppy or small dog.
customer_reviews.text: This was great for a scottish terrier puppy until he found the zippers and started chewing on them. The floor part can no longer attach. I loved the doors of the pen. We used this in our living room until he was potty trained. I give it a 3 for potty training only because it only helped to contain his messes. I'm still glad we got it so he would have more room and didn't have to stay in his crate during the day. When he would have accidents in his pen it was very easy to clean and sanitize. It is also very easy to transport so he could stay with us if it wasn't a pet friendly home.
customer_reviews.author: 3D in VA

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loved it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our cat as we drove to Alaska. Each night, we set it up so he could enjoy the trip and it gave us peace of mind knowing he couldn't slip off somewhere. He was comfortable in it, it's open and airy and easy to set up and take down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: made a great chick brooder!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use as a chick brooder and it worked amazingly well! Put 4 chicks in at about 2 weeks old when they graduated from the rubbermaid box and they were fine in this playpen until they were ready to go outside. Used pine shavings and a Brinsea EcoGlow brooderfor them - (not sure how a head lamp would work because of the soft top, i don't use the lamp) After I moved the chicks to their outside home I emptied the playpen and hosed down, hung it on the clothesline and then put it away until the next batch of chicks! Would recommend it for this slightly un-conventional usage!
customer_reviews.author: las

customer_reviews.title: Great for bottle feeding kittens/puppies
customer_reviews.text: Got this to keep kittens safe until they are ready to roam the whole house. Started out at 3 weeks when they started wondering out of the nursing box I was worried they would get hurt so this was PERFECT. Top unzips completely and is removable making it easy to reach in to get kittens/puppy’s out and clean. Bottom unzips completely and is machine washable. Side pockets are great for holding toys bottles notebooks (track feeding and weight) folds down easily I just can’t figure out how it folds back into itself for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color shipped
customer_reviews.text: I gave this playpen one star because the picture and description said pink and I was sent blue and that’s unacceptable and now I can’t exchange it - I can only return it and buy the pink and hope I get the pink and that means I won’t have a kennel for a few weeks and that’s unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: cdf

customer_reviews.title: So great for our new puppy, more than big enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a great playpen "condo" for your dog. I bought it for my new puppy and it has been a necessity! If you have a puppy or smaller to medium dog this is perfect, but when you get ready to potty train your puppy I would also purchase a crate, because you will need a small space and this is too big, so they will likely potty inside it. Also, I like to use the XL pads to line the entire bottom if you have a puppy; the regular (22"x22") are too small, so you will use about 5 each time.
customer_reviews.author: Kassie2398

customer_reviews.title: The new alternative to crate training
customer_reviews.text: We got a puppy and he fit into his metal crate perfectly fine for the first few weeks. But we bought this as a method of potty training and room seclusion. He enjoyed the extra space and could see us through the mesh netting. Only one accident inside and as he grew a bit, it became the perfect "crate" for him to sleep in every night. It fits up to three puppy beds, has a removable (mesh) roof, and a removable nylon-esk bottom that doesn't soak up any messes. This really was one of the best buys that we got for our puppy. Spacious but also doesn't allow them to roam and pee everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Dreibelbis

customer_reviews.title: Loved it but not great if your dog chews
customer_reviews.text: It was a great crate but our dog was able to chew the bottom zipper off of the zip-in circle. She only goes in it at night and I don't like the idea of a hard metal crate for her to sleep in. So I was super happy to find this. If your dog isn't teething this will be a great option. I loved it while it worked. I just wish the zipper was harder for dogs to get to. It was awesome at first. I dont know if I got a bad zipper or what but my dog was able to rip the zipper off in just a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: An awesome idea for kittens
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I bottle raise orphaned kittens and this is a life saver for them. I am able to allow them some room to move and play but still keep them safe and corralled. I also love the fact that the top and bottom unzips, this helps with cleaning it out. I have found that pee pads make for easier cleaning too. The way this folds up in between kitten litters helps with space, I have also learnt that PVC pipe inside the pen helps to stabilize this pen and helps to keep my big cats from collapsing this on the babies.
customer_reviews.author: Nina King

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if your dog will try to escape or hurt themselves
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the holy grail and I was wrong. My dog is a small lap dog barely 20lbs and she tore her way out of it twice. I admit I should have made her more comfortable to be inside while enclosed but oh my goodness. If you have a naughty puppy that you think has a possibility of breaking out or hurting themselves this is not the product for you. It was easy to assemble and she loves it to hangout in/eat/sleep and it’s a great size, but unfortunately I’m going to give my honest opinion that the door area should be more doggy proof, the zippers are very weak.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: A lot of awesome features I wasn’t expecting
customer_reviews.text: Alsolutely amazing product. Works perfectly for our ferrets who escape almost everything. They chewed and dug and eventually gave up and now love this pen. It’s of such a high quality I would have paid $100 and still been fully satisfied at its value. There is even a hole for their water bottle. This is the perfect ferret traveling solution for us. No more pet sitters. Yay!
customer_reviews.author: ChefKelsey

customer_reviews.title: Good for when your puppy is better trained
customer_reviews.text: Good for when your puppy is better trained, why? I have a 9 week old Pomsky and she likes to chew on everything and doesn't want to be left alone so with the "panels" being fabric and mesh, she easily tore them with her paws trying to scape and started chewing on the mesh part. so it is a great addition to put in the garden when she wants a bit of shade but definitely after she's being better trained and stops tearing and chewing things.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product so far!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. I have a baby mini pig and he's so small I am scared to leave him outside (hawks etc). this took about 60 seconds to assemble. great quality. love the top mesh zipper section and all the windows. It even comes with little stakes (and there are loops all around the bottom) to stake into the ground. Would definitely recommend! It also fairly large, so if you need to crate an animal (which I am NOT a fan of). I feel like this is a much better option (its open, and larger for them to walk around in). I also really like the openess of it, yet its secured in all locations.
customer_reviews.author: TrishTop Contributor: Nail Polish

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby kittens!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Super easy set up. Folds up very small. Perfect size. Using it for when I can't keep an eye on my 5 week old mischievous foster kitten. When I'm around I keep one of the doors open so she can get in and out and I can keep all of her nessasery items in there. Makes it easier for me. So overall I love it. She would much rather be running around the whole house climbing things and terrorizing the older resident cats but hey, can't please everyone. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Kyle S. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect for my girl to enjoy the outside without fear of getting attacked and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my cat so that she can go outside. Wish I got it years ago. Purrfect for my girl to enjoy the outside without fear of getting attacked and I have no fear of her running away. You would fit 4 cats or a small dog in this thing. It's so easy to bring out and inside also.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great puppy protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6 month old puppy when I had to return to work. It's roomy enough for her to move around and play while keeping her safe and secure while I'm away. Love that the top and bottom are washable. Very pleased with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Handy dandy
customer_reviews.text: Love this playpen great for giving my chicks outside time.
customer_reviews.author: Annalee65

customer_reviews.title: The top
customer_reviews.text: I recommend that the top be kept on due to our Yorkies act like their spring loaded and jump out . I use this as the sleeping room .they go through the front door and we close them up at bedtime .We have the back door flap folded up and backed up to a crate where they can do the potty thing and that stays open 24/7 but don't forget to close the front up when they rest or you wake up to all that mess.This is good outdoors just remove the bottom and use the stakes for more security .Then just pack it up , I really love this May order another just fo outdoors
customer_reviews.author: christine ullery

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for my dog. Easy fold & set up.
customer_reviews.text: Sammy loves his house. I keep his food, water and his bed inside. It is perfectly roomy for him when I have to be away for short periods of time. This is my 3rd one in 11 years so they don't last forever. When he scratches to get comfy the bottom eventually gets torn. I can fold this to put in my suitcase easily to take on trips. He goes on vacations with me and has no problem staying in his house if I go somewhere he can't.
customer_reviews.author: JJLYNN

customer_reviews.title: Our kitten loved this from day 1!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so that our kitten could be put in it at night while staying at a friend's house. From the first moment we popped it up she went in it happily and has loved it ever since. There is plenty of room for a blanket, her litter and water/food bowls, but even when she's not being kept in it, she loves running in and out and playing in it. When she was smaller she would play on top too, but now it collapses with her weight. haha! We thought we would just use it when we had to keep her in it, but we leave it up all the time for her now.
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Terrific pen - very big!
customer_reviews.text: We adopted an elderly chihuahua with poor vision, no hearing & questionable potty habits. He loves this pen, I think he feels very safe in it. We haven't had any problems with him destroying it but he does only have two teeth - on opposite sides of his mouth. The one thing I wish I'd done was measure out how big this would be in my space. The pen is humongous and the dog is 4 pounds. So it is castle like for him. We have 2 other little dogs that can fit in too, though we don't make a habit of it. (The dog is in the accompanying picture, but under a towel.)
customer_reviews.author: Sammib

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this cute tent! I wanted something easy and safe to bring my dogs outside in. This tent was exactly what I was looking for. It’s large enough and easy to set up. My chihuahuas are 6lbs and 8lbs. They have plenty of room. I purchased the round pad that other reviewers suggested for comfort and I’m glad I did. It’s a little bit of a pain to fold up , but otherwise I absolutely love it and definitely would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Best quality and size!
customer_reviews.text: Y’all!!! This is the best! Seriously if you have kittens (or cats) (or small dogs) this will change your life! We live in a one bedroom apartment and there are some times when I’m doing homework or work work that I need my cats to not be on my lap. This is the answer!! So amazing! They can’t knock it over, they don’t try to climb out, their litter box and toys can fit in it! Seriously amazing! They’re indoor cats and we’re going on a road trip with them and plan on taking this so they can go outside and stretch those legs! I’m seriously impressed with this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Madi

customer_reviews.title: Great for fostering kittens
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for myself & one for a friend. I foster kittens & this is perfect! It’s big enough to put the food & water, bedding & some toys & still give them room to play. It easy to clean. If it gets really messy I just take it apart & hose it off. It’s impossible to fold up though. I kept the instructions so I could fold it & couldn’t get it to fold for the life of me. I felt stupid, but my friend can’t fold hers either. Still love it!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Goenner

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for small pets!
customer_reviews.text: I got two kittens and needed something to keep them contained until they get used to each room. This was perfect!!! Easy to assemble. It folds out and you just add top and bottom with zipper. I’m so glad I got this before the kitten the kittens got here cause they were all over the place and when I needed couldn’t watch them they stayed in the tent. It’s small enough to put in corner and large enough for them to play. I even put a small litter box, their food bowl and a small bed with plenty of room to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Smalls

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect for the kitten that showed up in our backyard
customer_reviews.text: A tiny kitten came out from under a bush in our backyard, she was all alone and hungry. We have a cat and a dog so we needed to keep her separate. This was perfect to keep her contained, even since she's gotten bigger and we keep her put up so she won't get stepped on. Plenty of room and it's really convenient that the top zips off or you can zip open a door. Our full-grown cat sometimes hangs out with her in it now. In the video we have the top off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FOR TRAVELING VERY HAPPY WITH DOGGY PLAY PEN
customer_reviews.text: I TAKE MY LITTLE PUPPY BEST FRIEND WITH ME WHEN I TRAVEL. HE IS USED TO BEING IN HIS CRATE AT HOME WHILE I'M OUT TO WORK SO WHEN TRAVELING AND STAYING IN A HOTEL THIS WAS A NATURAL FOR HIM. IF YOU NEED TO GO OUT TO A RESTAURANT OR SUCH IT IS A GREAT PLACE FOR YOUR 4 LEGGED COMPANION TO SAFELY STAY WHILE YOU ARE GONE. PLENTY OF ROOM FOR A PIDDLE PAD, TOYS, WATER OR FOOD. SET UP IS A BREEZE AND PUT AWAY JUST AS FAST. STURDY AND COMPACT IN IT'S OWN CARRYING CASE WITH HANDLES. BEST PURCHASE I'VE MADE IN AWHILE.
customer_reviews.author: K. Blackwell

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, stylish, great features for visibility and easy cleaning and storage! Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Same day delivery, sturdy, good looking, spacious, well made and has several good features. I like that the top net detaches completely for optional use. I love that the base/floor part also detaches completely incase you want to clean it or wash it. The amount of netting is great for visibility and air flow. The height, shape and sturdiness is great. I'm really happy with my purchase because if you need to safe guard your furr baby/babies (as I need to with one month old kittens) you don't feel bad and instead feel good proving them a stylish and spacious place with ample view of the outside! The carry case is a great bonus! Great value for money!
customer_reviews.author: Savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: Worked for my 6 yr old kitty
customer_reviews.text: I would've given it 5 stars but little bummed you have to unzip top & bottom before taking down. I needed something quick to pop open and fold down fast for every day. It works for my 6 yr old kitty who I have to put in here while my Mynah bird is flying around and me cleaning out her aviary. Kitty doesn't mind being inside it and there's plenty of room and openness to look out. Once Mynah had her fly time & cage clean, I let kitty out and then have to take it down to fold away. I will keep it as I also foster kittens from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow wow wow perfect!!! Better than I thought!
customer_reviews.text: Used this to travel with my pet rabbit. It is absolutely perfect. The zipper mesh to was helpful to keep a cat from jumping inside. The solid zipper bottom is perfect also so I only have to clean that and not the whole playpen. Folds flat with a zipper case makes me love it even more. I was even able to use a grommet hole for his water bowl by using the pet carrier gate on the outside to hold his water because he likes to knock it over. I just detached the door from the carrier and then used the door-less carrier for him to use as a hiding place.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L. Pettinelli

customer_reviews.title: Great Product For The Cost
customer_reviews.text: My little girl cat broke her leg. Needed to keep her confined. Didn't want to keep her in a spare bedroom alone. Got this kennel and it is one of the best products I've purchased. There is enough room for a litter box, blankets, pillows, and food/water bowls. Even though she claws at the sides and mesh window and doors, there is no damage. There is a little fraying on the mesh but no tears or rips. For the price, this is very durable. Recommend this for small pets.
customer_reviews.author: SM Florida

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a month.
customer_reviews.text: Our 10 week old puppy chewed The zipper off the door and we woke up to her just walking around the room. So, I would LOVE to recommend this, because it almost lasted a month, but if my tiny dog can chew the zipper off and open the door herself, it’s not very good quality. I really wanted to like this thing, in fact I loved it... until my dog was able to get out when she wanted.
customer_reviews.author: MrAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Not for kittens
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for kittens. I definitely would not recommend it for kittens. They are destructive. They chewed up the netting, ripped parts of it up with their claws. It’s a great concept but kittens just do not like to be locked up. I think this would work great for a puppy or two. The bottom is a plastic piece and you can unzip it to clean it off which is great! It has pocket storage around the outside and two doors that can be used. The storage bag is a little big but it’s flat and super easy to throw in the trunk or under the bed.
customer_reviews.author: cnkd5

customer_reviews.title: Larger then it looks!
customer_reviews.text: New puppy loves it, I may have gotten a smaller one to start but overall we love this! Easy assembly, folds nicely, we keep the top off and she feels content not caged. Nice product. Addition to this review....Now that shes teething shes figured out how to open the zipper, ending up cheweing that area so badly i cant zip the bottom on anymore. till works nicely for outside but that may be a consideration for active pups.
customer_reviews.author: Ilene B

customer_reviews.title: Our cat can feel protected and secure. We don’t have to isolate her in another room.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this product to provide a safe place for our new Scottish Fold kitten. We have a 3 year old resident cat that is very territorial when it comes to her house. The tent is kept in our dinning kitchen area where she can get use to all the sounds and people in our home. Our older cat can see her, sniff her, or just watch her without problem. We did not like the idea of confining her to a bathroom or bedroom. It is very roomy to allow for her bed, litter box, toy, and food and water bowls as well as a scratch pad.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Puppies. They were in it, went potty, leaned on the side of this contraption....all the puppies and pee rolled around my kitchen like a giant hamster ball. Pee spilling out the sides. AWFUL. Seams ripped, zippers got stuck. This is for nice, calm, tiny dogs...or hamsters.... staked down in a yard. I had it for 2 weeks and threw it out. Complete waste of money, and its not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Not manufactured very well
customer_reviews.text: The first one I bought had several places along the bottom where the stitching wasn’t sewn down. I reordered it because I really liked the size and it was perfect for my 6 lb chihuahua. I got the replacement very fast, but it also has the same problem. I decided to keep it and I sewed the seams together with heavy duty upholstery thread. I really hope someone at Amazon looks into their quality control department. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t do the job
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love everything about this, but it just didn’t do the job. It didn’t. I actually got a replacement one time, and the second one had the SAME exact issue. It’s not made sturdy enough. It needs metal reinforcements. I used this as a whelping pen for four yorkie babies who used it until they were no more than 9wks old. They managed to break the zippers and therefore escape, just one out of the four little baby yorkies. Twice. I ended up having to build a fort around it that consisted of various household items and it just ended up being a complete hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Chanel

customer_reviews.title: Great quality! Bigger than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I love this playpen! I bought it for my Matipoo puppy so I can keep her contained when I'm not home. My pup actually loves her house, and after only a week, walks right in and lays down at bedtime. It is well made and totally sturdy. I absolutely love that both the top and bottom zip off! Bottom is water resistant so if water spills or the puppy has a "poo-pad miss," I dont need to worry about my floor. It's bigger than I expected...both in diameter and height, but that's ok. I made it work. I will probably look for a smaller one for when I travel with her. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle F.

customer_reviews.title: WOW its HUGE!!
customer_reviews.text: I use this to let me cat go outside and enjoy some fresh air without him trying to murder every other cat within a 6 block radius lol! The original pen I had started fraying and wearing out in general. I bought this one at the exact same price as the other and couldn't believe the size difference! This thing is HUGE!! My precious furry demon spawn loves it! <3
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality!! Easy assembly!!
customer_reviews.text: So far I love it!!! I just received it yesterday and will update more as time goes on! I really like the much sturdier material used than the last one I had!! This was SUPER easy to assemble and disassemble!! All the zippers zipped with ease! I’m using it for a new tiny puppy I adopted with a medical condition who’s a whole whopping 1lb so I don’t think I’ll use the bottom for now so it doesn’t get peed and pooped on lol. But so far I definitely LOVE this one compared to others I have bought!!
customer_reviews.author: amanda lynn champagne

customer_reviews.title: Good and Not-so-good. Depends on your animal.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is great if you have a dog with doesn't mind being confined. My13.5 # mini dachshund is able to get out though, by climbing and bringing the side down. When I zipped the top on, she managed to catch one of her nails in the screening and there was blood all over when I got home. It wasn't horrendous, but scared me. I think if you have an animal that doesn't mind being confined, it'll work great for you. For me, I can use it when I'm home, if I need to confine her.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie (Melzie)

customer_reviews.title: Best way to keep your puppy safe and happy
customer_reviews.text: This is the best invention for a small puppy who escapes any barricade you can create. It can also serve as a barricade in a doorway and has two ways to enter and exit on each side that easily zip and unzip where you can roll it up. The bottom zips on and is easy to clean and the top netting zips on. We unfolded it from the box and zipped on the top and bottom. It is very roomy and is honestly the best enclosure for a puppy and so worth the money - $40 😊😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 6 month old shorkie. We've been using it for him since we got him at 3 months and he's very comfortable in it. I was hoping that we wouldnt have to use the top net but he discovered that he can climb/jump out of it so we use the netting when we have to leave him on his own. It's great that the bottom is also detachable, it makes it easy to just take it to the backyard and hose it down. The folding is difficult but once you get it, it fits back nicely inside the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Great for kittens - plenty of room for food/water, litter box, and bed
customer_reviews.text: This has been great! We have two kittens and didn't want them running around scratching up furniture during the day while we were at work, and we also put them in there at night when we sleep for now. It has plenty of room and has two zipped openings in front and back, and the entire top unzips for easy access for cleaning, etc.... I would suggest finding an inexpensive 36" round carpet to put on the bottom to protect it from spills and accidents. We noticed that the top that zips on can unzip if a lot of pressure is put on it, but hasn't really been an issue. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: smullis1

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Pop-up!
customer_reviews.text: Love this pop up. It is easy to set-up and pack up and take with us on trips. We take this with us everywhere for our two 6 lb chihuahuas. There is plenty of room for both of them, and their water bowl. The zip on top keeps them safe from hawks, and cool, when we are outside. The fabric on the bottom is easy to clean and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Adams

customer_reviews.title: Great to take indoor animals outside safely
customer_reviews.text: I use this to take my indoor cat outside for some fresh air, and she loves it! Now that I know what I'm doing, I can set it up in about 30 seconds and take it down in less than a minute. I love that it comes with a bag for storage. Because all of the sides zip, I feel like this is a more safe option than others. I know that my cat cannot escape from it, which is huge for me. We now love sitting out on the patio together, and I call this her cat-io enclosure!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Maddamma

customer_reviews.title: Great kitten room
customer_reviews.text: This playpen is great for keeping kittens quarantined from house pets. It’s large but still fits in a room. I love that it has an elastic strap built-in, not sure why they sent it with the case. I love that it has two doors, is tall and has a zip out floor for cleaning. There’s plenty of room for a big bed, a litter box, and space to stretch out. And stores easy when not in use. I prefer these over the wire cages any day. My foster kittens love just playing with it as a trampoline!
customer_reviews.author: MyBestFriendisaPitbull

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Love
customer_reviews.text: We bought this in anticipation of our new Shih Tzu puppy. She loves it and we love it. It's big enough for a bed and her toys. She sleeps in it every night with no problems once she turned 7 1/2 weeks old. We were amazed. Now she runs in and drags her big plush bunny out to play. The bottom will zip out and the top will as well. It's made of a sail cloth type fabric. When she goes to visit we just fold it up and put it in the zipper case made of the same material.
customer_reviews.author: onlinegirl

customer_reviews.title: It's good because it saves me from my cat peeing in ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good because it saves me from my cat peeing in the house but it's definetly not waterproof. I have pee pads lining the bottom and twice now my cat has found the 2sq inches that aren't covered and somehow pee goes under the pad. It soaks everything and goes straight on my wood floor. ESP of near the zipper. Dissappointing because it leaves me this awkward sized pen to now clean of pee and my wood floor. So don't trust this being waterproof. As far as everything else it's great but one of my draws to this product was it's waterproof durability. Obviously animals will have accidents in it so that is #1 importance and it fails
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: DOGS CAN GET OUT !
customer_reviews.text: The top and bottom inner zip pieces that cover the top and the bottom of the playpen are too small. This causes a gap between the fabric pieces in the middle and outer structure of the playpen. This makes it impossible to potty retain because my small Chihuahua is able to escape from the bottom and also potty on carpet there for also makes it not waterproof. I’m sure larger dogs will be able to also escape once they discover there’s openings in bottoms and top .
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this playpen for my chinchilla to have some bounce time. It worked well for about 6 months. If he pees in the pen it’s very easy to clean up and doesn’t leak through. The only reason I am giving 3 stars is because after having it for 6 months the top cover zipper has worn out. It no longer stays zipped on and has worn out. I’m afraid I have to order a whole new pen. The product information says to contact the seller with any issues, but their contact info is nowhere to be found. Kinda sketchy.
customer_reviews.author: shellz

customer_reviews.title: Great For Cats Who Are Fighting!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for indoor use because my cats had gotten into a fight so I wanted to separate them but let them be able to see one another. My cats don't really like being closed off and scratch at the floor below doors so I was afraid of them scratching at the tent while inside it, but my cats really enjoy it! I keep a scratcher, litterbox, a blanket, and food and water in it and it isn't cluttered at all! I got the 48". I'm happy to say that my cats are now getting along but I still keep the tent up because they really enjoy it.
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Quality materials
customer_reviews.text: This pen is bigger than the previous one that we used for years while camping. The material is superior to the other and the area is bigger. I use it for our 2 smaller dogs, but this would also be suitable for the larger 20 pound too. Very happy with purchase. This did not come with ground stakes which I would have appreciated, however I do have some on hand.
customer_reviews.author: D HOUDE

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy for the money
customer_reviews.text: We bought this and mailed it to my MIL’s for a 1 week Xmas visit. My two 4 month puppies loved it from the start and would go in it to play and sleep. We brought it home and put it upstairs next to our bed where we zip them in each night. They eventually tore it up at the seems. But it took much longer than we expected considering there were two of them. We just bought our second one. For $40, it’s convenient and I don’t mind replacing it every few months. Eventually they won’t need it anymore because they will be potty trained.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bless

customer_reviews.title: LOVEEEEEE IT! Perfect
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. The product is perfect till this day! Would buy all over again. Our puppy is so comfortable in it. For people who are still potty training their puppy, and you have a lot of issues making your puppy focus on a potty pad just on the floor, use this as their own personal bathroom especially if it’s rainy outside or super cold! This is a really great way to help you’re puppy focus on going potty in one specific area.
customer_reviews.author: CTG27

customer_reviews.title: More comfortable for a cat than a dog crate
customer_reviews.text: I am using this for a foster cat recuperating from a leg fracture, whose movement has to be restricted. It was super easy to set up - about 5 minutes! - and is so much nicer than the cat having to be in a crate. It is roomy, and easily fits a litter box, cat bed, and good bowls. My only complaint is that the bottom is hard to clean - diet doesn’t easily come off. I solved that problem by putting a blanket in the bottom. Overall, very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Yarri

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase I have made!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Getting a new puppy always causes a problem as to where do you put them when you need to get things done. This was the BEST purchase I made!!!!!! I use it for my pup’s nap time, my busy time & all night sleeping time. It’s absolutely GREAT!!!!! Note: This is made for a small dog (my pup is a toy poodle and only 2.8 lbs). This works great for a small size dog. I would say under 10lbs. It also has a zippered covered top so the dog doesn’t jump out. But you can use it as a substitute for a crate as it has a small door for the dog to go in & out.
customer_reviews.author: Chris B

customer_reviews.title: Received a poor quality item.
customer_reviews.text: Used for a baby bunny for barely one month. The bottom isn't fully waterproof as advertised. The bunny peed, and it soaked into the zipper area which isn't waterproof. The metal wires in the frame started to bend and stick out. I only folded it as instructed, and I barely moved it. The fabric started coming apart at the seams, so my bunny can escape now. Not that portable or lightweight either. I found a bigger pop up tent that is even lighter and more sturdy/secure. This is now useless to me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, durable and is so easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: This is heavy duty and my Doxie Carin has given up trying to destroy this. Bottom zips right in, don’t use the top but it is nice. This is not like those nylon things. This stays out and she runs and plays and scratches. Holds all toys, food bowl and bed. I don’t put water because she gets to going too hard. She is 6 pounds. Pockets on the sides hold walker, treats and poop bags. Folds right up and fits really nice in the carry bag. I have never been so happy with a product that I haven’t used before. Definitely will buy another if need be.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is great for it's intended purpose. Best sellers I've ever dealt with.
customer_reviews.text: Your puppy will figure out how to destroy this thing if you don't watch it. Make sure you use it for its stated purpose. This is for temporary shelter only. It's great for a shelter while on an outing or in the backyard just don't leave a dog in this unsupervised. The dog will figure out how to get out. The sellers are great and stand by their product. I absolutely recommend buying from them. They replaced it without a problem and were very nice and quick about it.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Good for my needs
customer_reviews.text: So far this has been a great one, honestly it was a little bigger then I wanted, I wanted it for bottle baby kittens. They don't need much room but this will hold a full litter of baby kittens and a momma cat. Will not contain a kitten over 2lbs they will destroy with claws. Only appropriate for tiny kittens and small or calm dogs. It's not overly tall so not good for any large breed dogs Pic of some of my foster kittens post baths drying outside in the sun
customer_reviews.author: Kauai Kittens RescueTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: great pen
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my small blind puppy. My 17 pound older dog managed to break in through one of the zippered windows, stripped the zipper, to get to the puppies food! Imagine my surprise when I came home and the puppy had escaped and managed to use the dog steps and get up on the bed. When she only weighed about a pound and a half! I put a Plastic doggy play pen around it and now it's secured. Puppy digs in there but has not damaged it.
customer_reviews.author: Adele S

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: Was having new windows put in and had to kennel my to cats who had never been kenneled so I thought this would be a great option. It was like a kitty condo. I had them get used to it for a few days. Both of them tried valiantly to get out of it the minute I left but it was still standing in great condition when I returned even though both of my cats are huge and one pretty aggressive. Definitely a great product. Don't know what I would do with it now but cheap enough that it served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for our small puppy so he wasn’t trapped in a cage on days that we were away from the house for more than a couple hours. We couldn’t be happier with it. It’s big enough for a small dog to move around in, but not so large that it takes up an entire living room. It’s inrcedibly sturdy and can withstand him bouncing around. Best of all - it’s very easy to set up, very easy to take down, and stores conveniently in the travel bag they give you. My wife and I have noted several times that we believe they should be charging more for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Rocky Horror

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous item
customer_reviews.text: OK I wanted to give the full stars because it is a great item and the bottom keeps the floor protected from puppy leaks full spelling etc. My one big concern and you need to make sure that you address it and the company needs to fix it is the bungee cord on the side. My puppy has rolled her neck up and her legs and I choke called several times. This is a hazard, If you already have this you may try using a chip clip to roll it up. I don’t know how long that will be good for if she keeps chewing on the chip clip maybe she’ll lose interest. But this is a dangerous unnecessary situation.
customer_reviews.author: Zcurr

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and weight for portability
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item to allow us to bring our new puppy outside without worrying about him running away or touching grass since he hasn't completed his vaccines. It is the perfect size for indoor or outdoor use. It is sturdy and lightweight and pretty easy to fold into the carrying case. For the price, it's very well made and I have already recommended it to several other friends who have new puppies.
customer_reviews.author: SEF818

customer_reviews.title: Just the right size
customer_reviews.text: I needed something for my cat to sleep in at night that was moveable and didn't take up a lot of room like a cage would. Bought one of these in a 28" size but that was to small. No room for the litter box, food/water dishes and my cat. This size is perfect. Lots of room for all of it. Well worth the price too.
customer_reviews.author: catladyof6

customer_reviews.title: Great way to restrict her space while potty training when ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my Labrador puppy. After about one week, she learned how to pull the top down so she could crawl out, so I've resorted to putting the top on. Great way to restrict her space while potty training when I want to give her more space then her crate. I can put her in this to play with her toys when I'm getting ready for work or cleaning house or something. It's also easy to fold up and take with me when I want to take her to friend's houses. I plan on using it as her travel crate when we go camping this summer. So far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: Chery C Carrico

product_meta.title: ESK COLLECTION Blue 45" Pet Puppy Dog Playpen Exercise Pen Kennel 600d Oxford Cloth
product_meta.description: Color:BlueYour little ones will love this portable playpen from ESK Collection. While they run around and have fun in a safe and contained environment, you can keep an eye on them through the mesh screens on the sides and top of the playpen. Setting up the unit and tearing it down is simple and takes a few short seconds. With the included travel tote, you can bring this with on all of your trips to provide your pet with a contained play area Wherever you go. The storage compartments on the side allow you to keep your pet's toys and supplies all within reach whenever they are needed. The durable material is also easy to clean, with a removable bottom for easy washing. Treat your pet to the playpen they deserve with this easy to use ESK Collection portable pet Playpen! Approximate dimensions: 45" Diameter, 24" Height. New improvement: the bottom and top mesh panels are all zippers. If the Velcro your dog are able to escape.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
